title: Woman of the Year
creator_credit: George Stevens, Joseph L Mankiewicz and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
brief_description: In this sophisticated comedy, the initial venture of that impeccable partnership of Katharine Hepburn and Spencer Tracy, Hepburn plays a renowned columnist and celebrated expert on world affairs. Tracy works on the same newspaper as a sports writer. When Hepburn is nominated “Woman of the Year”, the fight is on between career and marriage.
